title: 96: The Republic: Book 1
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: This is the first episode of a series on Plato's Republic. I swear it's not as boring as it sounds. We'll see how far we get before A.J. gets distracted and decides to do something else.
itunes:author: Whatever. Anybody actually read this bit?
itunes:subtitle: If you were old and cranky, you were young and cranky.
